alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 10:48PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Breathitt County through 1130 PM EST... At 1048 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morris Fork, or 10 miles southeast of Booneville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Beech and Canoe around 1055 PM EST. Wolf Coal, Whick, Altro, Bush Branch, Barwick, Saldee, Howard Creek and Curt around 1100 PM EST. Little, Copland, Lost Creek and Haddix around 1105 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ned, Watts, Clayhole, Flintville, Hardshell and Noble. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
